whatIsInvoice.title: What is an Invoice?
whatIsInvoice.content: An invoice is an official document used to request payment for goods or services. It outlines what was sold, who sold it, who bought it, the agreed price, tax amounts, and payment terms. Invoices serve as critical financial and legal records.

seller.title: Invoice Creator - Seller Information
items: Company Name ‚Äì Official business name.
Business Address ‚Äì Registered address of the seller.
Company ID ‚Äì Official registration number.
Tax ID ‚Äì Tax identification number (if applicable).
Contact Details ‚Äì Email, phone number, and website.

buyer.title: Buyer Information
items: Client Name ‚Äì Name of the person or business being billed.
Client Address ‚Äì Delivery or legal address.
Company ID & Tax ID ‚Äì Registration and tax info of the buyer.
Contact ‚Äì Client's email or phone number.

details.title: Generate Invoice Details
items: Invoice Number ‚Äì Unique identifier for tracking.
Issue & Due Dates ‚Äì When invoice was created and when payment is due.
Currency ‚Äì Used for the transaction.
Reference ‚Äì Optional PO or order numbers.

payment.title: Payment Information
items: Accepted Methods ‚Äì Bank transfer, card, PayPal, cash, etc.
Bank Details ‚Äì Account number, IBAN, BIC/SWIFT.
Status ‚Äì Paid or unpaid label.

itemsTotals.title: Invoice Generator - Items and Totals
items: Service/Product ‚Äì Name of what was sold.
Quantity & Unit Price ‚Äì Per-item breakdown.
Tax Rate ‚Äì Percentage applied (if applicable).
Total ‚Äì Final amount including tax.

legal.title: Legal Relevance of Invoices
legal.content: Invoices are official commercial records used for tax reporting, financial accounting, and legal protection. Requirements vary by country ‚Äî always verify local regulations.
legal.purposeIntro: Common legal purposes of invoices include:
purposes: Filing tax returns and claiming deductions.
Providing evidence in disputes or audits.

meta.title: Frequently Asked Questions - Invoice Generator | Invoice.wiki
meta.description: Get answers to common questions about our free invoice generator. Learn about invoicing, tax support, PDF downloads, and business billing.
meta.ogDescription: Get answers to common questions about our free invoice generator and invoicing best practices.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get instant answers to common questions about our free invoice generator, privacy protection, and professional invoicing best practices.

questions.question: Do I need to register to create invoices?
questions.answer: No! Just open the form and start creating. No login, no signup, no personal info required.

questions.question: How quickly can I create an invoice?
questions.answer: 2-3 minutes. Fill in the fields, click download ‚Äî done.

questions.question: Is this tool completely free?
questions.answer: Yes, Invoice.wiki is a free invoice maker for both personal and commercial use with no hidden fees or subscription costs.

questions.question: What makes your invoice generator different?
questions.answer: Everything runs in your browser ‚Äî your data never leaves your device. No registration, 40+ currencies, 6 languages, flexible tax support, and customizable colors.

questions.question: Is my data safe?
questions.answer: Yes! Everything runs in your browser. Nothing is sent to servers.

questions.question: Do you store my invoice data?
questions.answer: No. All processing is local. Close the tab ‚Äî data is gone.

questions.question: Can I use this for sensitive info?
questions.answer: Yes. No data leaves your device ‚Äî safe for confidential details.

questions.question: What happens when I download the PDF?
questions.answer: PDF is generated in your browser and saved to your device. Nothing stored server-side.

questions.question: Can I download my invoice as PDF?
questions.answer: Yes! Click 'Generate Invoice' and your PDF downloads instantly. Ready to send or print.

questions.question: How does tax calculation work?
questions.answer: Tax is calculated per line item using the tax-exclusive method: Net Price √ó Tax Rate%. The tax amount is added on top of the net price. This is the standard for B2B invoicing worldwide. You can choose between VAT, GST, Sales Tax, or disable tax entirely. Each item can have its own tax rate.

questions.question: What currencies are supported?
questions.answer: 40+ currencies: USD, EUR, GBP, PLN, CZK, UAH, JPY, and many more. Amounts format automatically based on the selected currency.

questions.question: Can I customize invoice colors and languages?
questions.answer: Yes! 10 accent colors to match your brand + 6 languages (EN, DE, CS, PL, SK, UK) for international clients.

questions.question: Can I add my company logo?
questions.answer: Not yet ‚Äî we focus on clean text-based invoices for privacy (no uploads to servers). Your company details in text fields look professional.

questions.question: Are the invoices legally valid?
questions.answer: Yes ‚Äî includes all required elements: invoice number, dates, parties, items, taxes, totals. Check your local regulations for specifics.

questions.question: Can I use this for international business?
questions.answer: Yes! 40+ currencies, 6 languages, flexible tax. Works globally.

questions.question: What info is required?
questions.answer: Your business details, client info, invoice number, date, items with prices. Tax is optional.

questions.question: How should I number invoices?
questions.answer: Sequential (INV-001, INV-002) or with date (2024-001). Be consistent for accounting.

questions.question: What browsers are supported?
questions.answer: All modern browsers: Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge. Desktop and mobile.

questions.question: Can I use this on mobile?
questions.answer: Yes! Fully responsive ‚Äî works on phones and tablets.

questions.question: Technical issues?
questions.answer: Try refresh, clear cache, or incognito mode. That fixes most issues.

questions.question: Can I save and continue later?
questions.answer: No persistent save (for privacy). Complete in one session or copy to notes.

questions.question: Good for freelancers?
questions.answer: Perfect. Professional invoices, no costs, tax included.

questions.question: Small businesses?
questions.answer: Yes! Professional output without enterprise complexity.

questions.question: Recurring invoices?
questions.answer: No automation, but easy to duplicate ‚Äî just update date and number.

questions.question: Payment tracking?
questions.answer: We create invoices; use a spreadsheet or accounting app to track payments.

stillHaveQuestions.title: Still Have Questions?
stillHaveQuestions.content: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Start creating your professional invoice right away or learn more about our service.

meta.title: Privacy Policy - Invoice.wiki
meta.description: Invoice.wiki privacy policy. We don't collect personal data - all processing happens in your browser. No tracking, no data storage, complete privacy protection.
meta.ogDescription: Complete privacy protection with Invoice.wiki. No data collection, browser-based processing, and secure invoice generation.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy - Invoice Wiki Generator

noCollection.title: Invoice Generator Privacy - No Data Collection
content: free invoice generator does not collect personal data. All invoice creation and PDF generation happens within your web browser. Professional invoices are created on your device, and all invoice data is cleared when you close your browser.
We do not use cookies for tracking or advertising. The only data we store in your browser is theme preferences (light/dark) in localStorage to provide a consistent user experience.
We use Vercel Analytics to collect anonymous usage statistics that help us improve the service. This data does not contain any personal information.

howWeProtect.title: How Invoice Wiki Protects Your Privacy When You Create Invoice
howWeProtect.intro: At Invoice Wiki, we believe your business information should remain completely private. Our free invoice generator is designed with privacy-first principles when you generate invoice:

items.title: Local Processing
items.content: All invoice generator data is processed locally in your browser using JavaScript. No information is sent to our servers when you create invoice.

items.title: No Registration Required
items.content: You can start creating invoices immediately without providing any personal information to use our invoice creator.

items.title: No Data Storage
items.content: We don't store your invoice details, client information, or business data on our servers when you generate invoice.

items.title: Secure PDF Generation
items.content: PDF invoice files are created locally in your browser and downloaded directly to your device.

items.title: No Email Required
items.content: Unlike other invoice generators, we never ask for your email address or contact details to create invoice.

whatWeDoNotCollect.title: What Information We Don't Collect
whatWeDoNotCollect.intro: To be completely transparent, here's what we specifically do NOT collect:
items: Your name, email address, or contact information
Client names, addresses, or business details
Invoice amounts, line items, or payment information
Bank account details or payment methods
IP addresses for tracking purposes
Browser fingerprints or device identifiers

analytics.title: Anonymous Analytics
analytics.intro: We use Vercel Analytics to understand how our free invoice generator is being used. This helps us improve the service and identify technical issues. The analytics data is completely anonymous and includes only:
items: Page views and popular features
Browser types and device categories (mobile/desktop)
General geographic regions (country-level)
Technical performance metrics
analytics.note: This data cannot be used to identify individual users and is aggregated across all visitors.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: Invoice.wiki is hosted on Vercel's secure infrastructure. While we don't send your invoice data to any third parties, standard web hosting logs may contain basic technical information like request times and general error data. Learn more

rights.title: Your Rights and Control
rights.intro: Since we don't collect your personal data, there's nothing for us to delete, modify, or transfer. You maintain complete control over your information at all times. If you have concerns about privacy, you can:
items: Use Invoice.wiki in incognito/private browsing mode
Clear your browser's localStorage to remove theme preferences
Disable JavaScript (though this will prevent the invoice generator from working)

readyCta.title: Ready to Create Secure Invoices?
readyCta.content: Experience the most private way to generate professional invoices online. No registration, no data collection, just fast and secure billing.

form.termsRequired: You must accept the terms and conditions

acceptanceOfTerms.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptanceOfTerms.content: By accessing or using Invoice.wiki (the "Service"), you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions ("Terms"). If you do not agree with any part of these Terms, you must discontinue use of the Service immediately.

descriptionOfService.title: 2. Description of Service
descriptionOfService.content: Invoice.wiki provides a free, web-based invoice generation tool. All invoice generation occurs entirely within your browser; no data is transmitted to or stored on our servers. We do not offer data storage, retrieval, or recovery services.

noWarranties.title: 3. No Warranties
noWarranties.content: The Service is provided "as is" and "as available," without any warranties of any kind, whether express or implied. We do not guarantee that the Service will be error-free, uninterrupted, or free from defects. To the fullest extent permitted by law, we disclaim all warranties, including but not limited to warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement.

limitationOfLiability.title: 4. Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.content: To the extent permitted by applicable law, Invoice.wiki, its owners, employees, officers, agents, affiliates, and partners shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or exemplary damages arising from your use of the Service. This includes, but is not limited to, damages for loss of profits, goodwill, data, or other intangible losses, even if we have been advised of the possibility of such damages.

indemnification.title: 5. Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless Invoice.wiki, its owners, employees, officers, agents, affiliates, and partners from any claims, damages, liabilities, costs, and expenses (including reasonable legal fees) arising out of:
items: Your use or misuse of the Service.
Your violation of these Terms.
Any claims made by third parties related to invoices generated using the Service.

governingLaw.title: 6. Governing Law and Jurisdiction
governingLaw.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Czech Republic. Any disputes arising out of or in connection with these Terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of the Czech Republic.

changesToTerms.title: 7. Changes to Terms
changesToTerms.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting on our website. Your continued use of the Service after any such changes constitutes your acceptance of the new Terms.

versionHistory.title: 8. Version History
versionHistory.content: This section provides a historical record of changes to these Terms and Conditions.
versionHistory.v1: Version 1.0 (Published: February 25, 2025) ‚Äì Initial release of Terms and Conditions.

contactInfo.title: 9. Contact Information
contactInfo.content: If you have any questions regarding these Terms, please contact us:
